meanings.definition: A person who is exceptionally skilled at selling products or services.
meanings.sent1: The supersalesmen convinced everyone to buy the new vacuum cleaner.
meanings.sent2: The supersalesmen at the electronics store always meet their sales targets.
meanings.sent3: The supersalesmen joked that they could sell ice to polar bears.
meanings.sent4: She was a supersalesmen, able to charm even the most hesitant customers.
meanings.sent5: The supersalesmen's persuasive skills were unmatched in the industry.

meanings.definition: The act of selling products or services in an exceptional manner.
meanings.sent1: His supersalesmen was evident when he closed the deal in record time.
meanings.sent2: The company's success was attributed to their innovative supersalesmen.
meanings.sent3: The supersalesmen of the car salesman left customers amazed at his pitch.
meanings.sent4: Her supersalesmen was like a well-oiled machine, smoothly closing every sale.
meanings.sent5: The supersalesmen of the team led to a significant increase in revenue.
